xwikidoc.content: ### Home page ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.homePageTitle=App Within Minutes ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.description=Create collaborative web applications within minutes, based on XWiki's powerful structured data management system. platform.appwithinminutes.createAppButtonLabel=Vytvoriť aplikáciu platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTableHeading=Aplikácie platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.space=Názov aplikácie platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.author=Posledný autor platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.date=Dátum aktualizácie platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable._actions=Akcie ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.grantSpaceAdminRightsSaveComment=Grant space administration rights. ### AWM Applications panel entry ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appPanelCreateEntry=Create your own! ### Wizard step platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHeading=Krok {0} — {1} appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.name=Meno appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.title=Pomenujte svoju aplikáciu appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.description=Pomenujte svoju aplikáciu appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.name=Štruktúra appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.title=Definujte štruktúru aplikácie ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.description=Describe the application data ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.name=Entries ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.title=Locate your data ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.description=Choose where to store the data appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.name=Prezentácia appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.title=Prispôsobiť úvodnú stránku aplikácie. appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.description=Prispôsobiť úvodnú stránku aplikácie. platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepNextButtonLabel=Ďalší krok platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepNextButtonTip=Ďalší krok platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepFinishButtonLabel=Skončiť platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepFinishButtonTip=Prejsť na domovskú stránku aplikácie. platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepPreviousButtonLabel=Predchádzajúci krok platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepPreviousButtonTip=Predchádzajúci krok platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHelpTitle=Kroky ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHelpDescription=This wizard will guide you through the process of creating an application. These are the steps you'll take: ### Wizard Step 1: Application Name ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.location.label=Location ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.location.hint=The location in the page hierarchy where the application will be created. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.label=Parent ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.hint=The parent of the new application. Leave this field empty if you want to create a top level application. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.placeholder=Path.To.Parent ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.title=Code ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.description=This is the place where the application code is located. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.hiddenPagesInfo=The hidden pages are also listed, even though your current user profile settings prevent to do so, otherwise none of the application code pages would be visible because they are all hidden by default. platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePageTitle=Vytvoriť aplikáciu platform.appwithinminutes.appNameLabel=Názov aplikácie ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNameHint=The application name determines the homepage URL and the location where the application code is stored. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePreviewHomePageUrlLabel=Application homepage URL ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePreviewCodeSpaceLabel=Application code location ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNameIsUsedWarning=This application already exists. If you go to the next step you will be editing the existing application. platform.appwithinminutes.appNameEmptyError=Prosím, zadajte názov aplikácie. ### Wizard Step 2: Application Structure ###
